H0.text: Who was the female member of the SDP's 'Gang Of Four'. Barbara Castle

H1.text: Who was the female member of the SDP's 'Gang Of Four'. Judith Hart

H2.text: Who was the female member of the SDP's 'Gang Of Four'. Jo Richardson

H3.text: Who was the female member of the SDP's 'Gang Of Four'. Shirley Williams

A4.text: In 1981, dismayed with the Labour Party's left‑ward movement under Michael Foot, she was one of the 'Gang of Four'—centrist Labour figures who formed the SDP.

A5.text: She was one of the 'Gang of Four' rebels who founded the Social Democratic Party (SDP) in 1981.
